title: Add interactive launch roadmap section to homepage

requirements.summary: Add a new roadmap section on the homepage that displays a prominent Launch button showing the DEX soft launch date of March 31st as a visual indicator
acceptanceCriteria: Launch button is prominently displayed in a roadmap section on the homepage
Button clearly shows the date March 31st as the DEX launch date
Button has an eye-catching design that fits the wolf/pack theme

file_operations.description: Create a new LaunchRoadmap component that displays a prominent Launch button with the March 31st DEX soft launch date. The component should use useInView hook for scroll animations matching other homepage sections. The button should feature eye-catching wolf/pack themed design with neon glow effects consistent with the existing visual aesthetic. Include hover effects and accessibility attributes.

Import and integrate the new LaunchRoadmap component into the homepage layout. Position it between the Presale and existing Roadmap sections to maintain logical flow. Ensure proper section spacing and responsive behavior consistent with other sections.

requirements.summary: Make the Launch button clickable to reveal detailed Wolf Pack launch information including the soft launch on DEX (March 31st) with 'Initial Expansion of Wolf World' description and the Tier 1 exchange launch approximately 3 months later (end of June)
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Launch button opens a modal or expands a section with detailed launch information
Details include Soft Launch on DEX (March 31st) with phase description 'Initial Expansion of Wolf World'
Details include Tier 1 Exchange Launch milestone approximately 3 months after soft launch (around end of June)
The expanded view presents the roadmap phases in a clear, visually appealing timeline format

file_operations.description: Implement click handler and state management for the Launch button to toggle a modal or expanded section. Create a detailed launch timeline view displaying two phases: 1) Soft Launch on DEX (March 31st) with 'Initial Expansion of Wolf World' description, and 2) Tier 1 Exchange Launch (approximately end of June, ~3 months after soft launch). Present phases in a clear vertical timeline format with phase indicators, dates, and descriptions. Include smooth animations for expand/collapse transitions and modal backdrop if using modal approach.

Create a reusable LaunchModal component to display the expanded launch details in an overlay. Include backdrop click-to-close, ESC key handler, focus trap, and ARIA attributes for accessibility. Style consistently with the wolf/pack theme using neon accents and dark background. Display the two launch phases with clear typography hierarchy, icons, and animations when the modal opens.

requirements.summary: Integrate the new roadmap section seamlessly into the existing homepage layout using consistent styling, animations, and theme elements matching the wolf/pack aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Roadmap section is positioned appropriately within the homepage flow
Section uses consistent color scheme, typography, and spacing from existing components
Animations and transitions match the style of other homepage sections
Section is fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports

file_operations.description: Apply consistent styling matching existing homepage sections. Use the same color variables from index.css (OKLCH color scheme), typography scale from Tailwind config, and section padding/spacing patterns. Implement responsive breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop) matching other sections. Add scroll-triggered animations using the useInView hook consistent with Features, Gallery, and Story components. Ensure neon glow effects and hover states match the wolf/pack aesthetic throughout the site.

Style the modal using the same theme variables, typography, and spacing as other components. Implement responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports. Add smooth enter/exit animations for the modal and backdrop. Use consistent button styles, neon accent colors, and wolf-themed visual elements. Ensure proper z-index layering and backdrop blur effects matching the site aesthetic.
